PLATINUM_HISTORY.evidence: TP chemotherapy 6 cycles after primary surgery; no explicit relapse documented.

SURGERY_DONE.procedure: Radical hysterectomy with bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy, pelvic mass resection, partial rectosigmoid resection, sigmoid colostomy, omentectomy, pelvic lymphadenectomy, appendectomy, paraaortic lymphadenectomy

discontinuation.detail: Temporarily stopped due to adverse reactions and low platelets; restarted 2022-05-23; held 3 weeks around hernia repair; currently continuing

RELAPSE_DATE.evidence: No relapse; pelvic MRI 2022-10-25 showed no abnormal soft tissue in pelvis.

CASE_CORE.CURRENT_STATUS: On maintenance niraparib; ECOG 1; recent imaging without pelvic recurrence.

current_regimen.name: 尼拉帕利

monitoring: Monitor platelet count due to prior thrombocytopenia

findings: Right upper lung arteriovenous fistula similar to prior
Right upper lung apical segment small nodule similar to prior
Left upper lung scattered tiny nodules
Small bilateral pleural effusions decreased compared with prior
Scattered chronic inflammatory and fibrotic changes in lungs
Nodule at right cardiophrenic angle less apparent
studies.impression: Pulmonary AV fistula and nodules unchanged; pleural effusions and atelectasis improved

findings: Hemangioma in liver right lobe segment VII similar to prior
Left renal cyst similar to prior
Localized uneven sclerotic change in lumbar vertebrae similar to prior
studies.impression: Stable hemangioma and renal cyst; spinal sclerosis unchanged; chest findings to correlate with other exams

findings: Postoperative changes after ovarian cancer surgery

specimens.site: Uterus, bilateral adnexa, pelvic mass, rectosigmoid colon, peritoneum, omentum, appendix, lymph nodes
specimens.diagnosis: Adenocarcinoma consistent with high-grade serous carcinoma
involvement_sites: Partial rectosigmoid colon from serosa to superficial muscle
Para-aortic and mesenteric lymph nodes (some positive)
specimens.raw_text: 术后病理：标本类型:扩大子宫+双附件+巨大盆块+部分直乙结肠+盆腹腔多病灶肿瘤大小:左侧：3.5×2×1.5cm；右侧：6×5.5×4.5cm肿瘤侧别:双侧病理类型:腺癌，结合免疫组化结果（I2021-07819），符合高级别浆液性癌。其他部位情况:左输卵管:见癌累及右输卵管:见癌累及子宫内膜:萎缩改变宫颈:慢性炎子宫肌层:见癌累及；肌壁间平滑肌瘤（多枚，直径0.5-2cm）盆腹腔多部位病灶:（部分直乙结肠）见癌累及，自浆膜层浸润至浅肌层，肠管两切缘未见癌累及。（大网膜、大网膜及盆腔肿块、左侧结肠旁沟腹膜、小肠系膜肿瘤、乙状结肠系膜肿瘤）见癌累及.（阑尾及周围肿块） 浆膜层见癌累及。其他:送检淋巴结（6/24）见癌转移，其中：左盆腔淋巴结（1/4）；右盆腔淋巴结（3/8）；腹主肠系膜下方淋巴结（1/4）； 肠系膜下动脉上方淋巴结（1/2）；腹主动脉旁淋巴结（0/6）。

milestones.description: Primary debulking surgery for ovarian cancer

TOXICITIES.toxicity: Strong adverse reaction to niraparib with thrombocytopenia (PLT 33)

response:
# Final Assessment:
High-grade serous ovarian carcinoma, HRD-positive/BRCA1/2-negative [@OH2201222 | Genomics], currently in clinical remission on first-line niraparib maintenance. Labs demonstrate recovered hematologic parameters (PLT 145×10⁹/L) and normal CA125 (6.45 U/ml) [@20230109|5600622 | LAB] [@20230109|9701878 | LAB]. Pelvic MRI shows no evidence of recurrence [@2022-10-25|MR | MR]; patient tolerating maintenance well with ECOG 1.

# Core Treatment Strategy:
- Continue niraparib maintenance therapy per HRD-positive status and ESMO guidelines [@guideline:esmo_cpg_epithelialovarian_2023__v00000000 | Page 8]
- Schedule pelvic MRI and CA125 surveillance every 3-4 months per standard maintenance follow-up protocols
- CT chest follow-up in 3-6 months for stable right upper lung AV fistula and 4mm nodule [@2022-09-27|CT | CT]
- Complete formal FIGO staging documentation and IHC panel for comprehensive pathologic records

# Change Triggers:
- If CA125 rises >2× ULN or imaging shows new lesions, reassess with PET-CT and consider platinum rechallenge
- If severe thrombocytopenia recurs (PLT <50), hold niraparib and dose-reduce per toxicity management [@pubmed | 40687421]

---

gold_plan:
继续用药
检验科申请：血常规新(五分类)　肝功能(全套)　肾功能(不含血糖)　CA125(肿瘤抗原CA125)　HE4（卵巢癌）检查地点：徐汇院区：东安路270号1号楼3楼检验科 。西药及中成药方：[甲]琥珀酸亚铁片　0.1g*12片*3板/盒,PVC×2盒/口服　2片/bid[甲]利可君片　20mg*48#×1盒/口服　1片/bid。西药及中成药方：※[乙10%]甲苯磺酸尼拉帕利胶囊(　100mg*30粒/盒,铝塑包×2盒/口服　2粒/qd【医保限定支付范围:本品适用于晚期上皮性卵巢癌、输卵管癌或原发性腹膜癌成人患者对一线含铂化疗达到完全缓解或部分缓解后的维持治疗】。
question_raw:
卵巢癌：流调否认中高风险地区旅居史，否认体温异常等新冠肺炎症状。2021.08.26在全麻下行扩大性全子宫切除术+双附件切除术+盆腔肿块切除术+直肠乙状结肠部分切除术+乙状结肠造口术+大网膜切除术+盆腔淋巴结清扫术+阑尾切除术+腹主动脉旁淋巴结清扫术。术后病理：标本类型:扩大子宫+双附件+巨大盆块+部分直乙结肠+盆腹腔多病灶肿瘤大小:左侧：3.5×2×1.5cm；右侧：6×5.5×4.5cm肿瘤侧别:双侧病理类型:腺癌，结合免疫组化结果（I2021-07819），符合高级别浆液性癌。其他部位情况:左输卵管:见癌累及右输卵管:见癌累及子宫内膜:萎缩改变宫颈:慢性炎子宫肌层:见癌累及；肌壁间平滑肌瘤（多枚，直径0.5-2cm）盆腹腔多部位病灶:（部分直乙结肠）见癌累及，自浆膜层浸润至浅肌层，肠管两切缘未见癌累及。（大网膜、大网膜及盆腔肿块、左侧结肠旁沟腹膜、小肠系膜肿瘤、乙状结肠系膜肿瘤）见癌累及.（阑尾及周围肿块） 浆膜层见癌累及。其他:送检淋巴结（6/24）见癌转移，其中：左盆腔淋巴结（1/4）；右盆腔淋巴结（3/8）；腹主肠系膜下方淋巴结（1/4）； 肠系膜下动脉上方淋巴结（1/2）；腹主动脉旁淋巴结（0/6） .
2021.09.06、09.07予顺铂50mg腹腔化疗、2021.10.18起行TP化疗6程，末次化疗2022.3.22我院基因检测结果：HRD(+)服用尼拉帕利1周，诉反应大，自2022.4.26开始停药。2022.4.18血常规：PLT:33今日血常规：PLT:342022.5.23起恢复尼拉帕利1#qd。
目前反应可。2022.6.24至中山医院行腹壁疝修补术。因手术尼拉帕利停药3周。目前继续口服尼拉帕利中。诉最近腹痛几次，腹胀明显。CT（2022.09.27）：右上肺动静脉瘘可能同前，请结合临床及专项检查。右上肺尖段小结节同前，左上肺散在小微小结节，随访。两侧胸腔内少量积液较前吸收；双肺散在慢性炎症及纤维，肺叶不张较前好转。右侧心膈角处结节较前不明显。甲状腺及腹部情况请结合相关检查。
CT（2022.10.08）：肝右叶VII段血管瘤同前。左肾囊肿同前。腰椎局部骨质不均匀致密同前，随访。胸部情况请结合相关检查。
MR（2022.10.25）：卵巢癌术后，目前盆腔未见异常软组织影，请随访。最近复查报告好。2022.12.30中山医院：切口疝，肝右叶低密度灶。血常规、肝肾功能一般可; ECOG=1
